content.title: WIfI Classification
content.definition: Wound, Ischemia, and foot Infection classification stratifies amputation risk and revascularization benefit.
content.statement: WIfI Classification is a fundamental concept in Health-Sciences Medicine Surgery Vascular Pathology Pad that provides essential knowledge for understanding related topics and clinical/practical applications.
